SWE4103 API Reference¶

League Module¶

class resources.League.League¶
get()¶

Gets all league records from the database.

Returns:The list of all leagues
{
    'leagues': List (of League JSON objects)
}

League JSON object:

{
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'managerID': Integer,
    'leagueName': String,
    'season': String
}

Success gives status code 200

post()¶

Adds a new league to the database.

Todo

Privileges associated with token

token = request.headers.get('Authorization')
if not token:
    abort(403, error="Unauthorized Access (no token)")
Input:

JSON object representing the league

{
    'leagueName': String,
    'season': String
}
Returns:

The league object that was created

{
    'leagueName': String,
    'season': String
}

Success gives status code 201

Player Module¶

class resources.Player.Player¶

This endpoint allows access to the players table records.

get()¶

Gets all player records from the database.

Returns:The list of all teams
{
    'players': List (of  Player JSON objects)
}

Player JSON object:

{
    'playerID': Integer,
    'teamID': Integer,
    'firstName': String,
    'lastName': String,
    'email': String,
    'number': Integer,
    'loanedGames': Integer,
    'goals': Integer,
    'cleanSheets': Integer,
    'yellowCards': Integer,
    'redCards': Integer
}

Success gives status code 200

post()¶

Adds a new player to the database.

Input:

JSON object representing the player

{
    'teamID': Integer,
    'firstName': String,
    'lastName': String,
    'email': String (optional),
    'number': Integer (optional)
}
Returns:

The player object that was created

{
    'teamID': Integer,
    'firstName': String,
    'lastName': String,
    'email': String,
    'number': Integer
}

Success gives status code 201

Team Module¶

class resources.Team.Team¶

This endpoint allows access to the teams table records.

delete()¶

Deletes a team from the database.

Input:

ID of the team to delete.

{
    'teamID': Integer
}

Possible status codes: 403 = No permissions, 200 = Successfully deleted.

get()¶

Gets all team records from the database.

Returns:The list of all teams
{
    'teams': List (of Team JSON objects)
}

Team JSON object:

{
    'teamID': Integer,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'managerID': Integer,
    'teamName': String,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code),
    'leaguePoints': Integer,
    'wins': Integer,
    'losses': Integer,
    'draws': Integer,
    'gamesPlayed': Integer,
    'goalsFor': Integer,
    'goalsAgainst': Integer,
    'goalsDifference': Integer,
    'cleanSheets': Integer,
    'yellowCards': Integer,
    'redCards': Integer
}

Possible status codes: 200 = Success.

post()¶

Adds a new team to the database.

Input:

JSON object representing the team

{
    'teamName': String,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code)
}
Returns:

The team object that was created

{
    'teamName': String,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code)
}

Possible status codes: 403 = No permissions, 201 = Successfully added.

put()¶

Updates a team object in the database.

Input:

Team JSON object with new data.

{
    'teamID': Integer,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'managerID': Integer,
    'teamName': String,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code),
    'leaguePoints': Integer,
    'wins': Integer,
    'losses': Integer,
    'draws': Integer
}
Returns:

The updated team JSON object

{
    'teamID': Integer,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'managerID': Integer,
    'teamName': String,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code),
    'leaguePoints': Integer,
    'wins': Integer,
    'losses': Integer,
    'draws': Integer
}

Possible status codes: 403 = No permissions, 200 = Successfully updated.

Token Handler¶

class common.TokenHandler.TokenHandler¶

TokenHandler is for handling tokens

create_token(email)¶

Creates a token from a user email

Parameters:email – User email (String)
Returns:JSON Web Token (String) with the user email encoded inside
decode_token(token)¶

Decodes from a token to a user email

Parameters:token – JSON Web Token (String)
Returns:User email (String)

Aborts with a 401 if no token is passed in or the token is expired

refresh_token(token)¶

Creates a new refreshed token

Parameters:token – JSON Web Token (String)
Returns:JSON Web Token (String) with a refreshed expiration date

User Module¶

class resources.User.Login¶

Endpoint for logging in.

post()¶

Attempts to log in with the given account.

Input:

JSON object with the user email and password.

{
    'email': String,
    'password': String
}
Returns:

The JSON Web Token and the user’s data.

{
    'token': String (JSON Web Token),
    'user_data':
        {
            'userID': Integer,
            'userType': String,
            'firstName': String,
            'lastName': String,
            'email': String,
            'lastLogin': String
        }
}

Success gives status code 201

class resources.User.Register¶

Endpoint for registering a new user account.

post()¶

Adds a new user to the database with default permissions.

Input:

JSON object representing the new user account

{
    'email': String,
    'password': String,
    'firstName': String,
    'lastName': String
}
Returns:

The user object that was created

{
    'teamName': String,
    'leagueID': Integer,
    'colour': String (Hex Colour Code)
}

Success gives status code 201

class resources.User.TokenValidation¶

Endpoint for validating web tokens

get()¶

Checks if the current web token is valid, then refreshes the token and user data.

Input:
Header:
'Authorization': String (JSON Web Token)
Returns:

The refreshed JSON Web Token

{
    'token': String (JSON Web Token)
}

Success gives status code 200 Failiure gives status code 403

class resources.User.User¶

This endpoint allows access to the users table records.

get()¶

Gets user data from the database.

Input:
Header:
'Authorization': String (JSON Web Token)
Returns:

A JSON object containing the user data.

{
    'userID': Integer,
    'userType': String,
    'firstName': String,
    'lastName': String,
    'email': String,
    'lastLogin': String
}

Success gives status code 200
